titleStmt.title: SII 13.183: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 183. (A.R. No. 347 of 1918.) PAḺŪR, TRICHINOPOLY TALUK, TRICHINOPOLY DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, SUNDARĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an endowment of land after purchasing it from the ūrār of Tiruppaḻuvūr in Viḷattūr-nāḍu, who made it tax-free after reclamation, by Śāttaṉ Āchchaṉ of Ādavattūr in Uṟaiyūr-kūṟṟam, for the special sacred bath of the deity on the days of Saṅkrānti.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . korācakecaripaṉmaṟku yā
ṇṭu 8Āvatu viḷattūrnāṭṭut ti
ruppaḻuvūr Ūrāy Icainta Ūrom tiru
ppaḻuvūrp parameśvararkku caṅkirānti toṟu
m snapaṉaṅ ceyvataṟku Uṟaiyūrkūṟ ṟattu
Ātavattūruṭaiyāṉ cāttaṉ Āccaṉu
kku Ūrom Emmilicainta vilaippo
ruḷ koṇṭu viṟṟukkuṭukka vilai ko
ṇṭu kallikkuṭutta puṉceykku
Ellai kiḻpāṟkellai Āṟṟu
kkup poṉa vaḻikku meṟkum teṉ
pāṟkellai kiḻaccerip pakkattu pu
ṉceykkum Itaṟku meṟku meṟceri
p pakkattup puṉceykku vaṭakkum me
lpāṟkkellai Ūrppotuvāykkālu
kku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai meṟceri
pakkattup puṉceykku teṟku Ivvicai
tta perunāṉkellaiyilum A
kappaṭṭa nilam Eḻumā Eḻumāvum U
ṇṇilam Oḻiviṉṟi viṟṟukkuṭuttu
Itaṉāl vanta Iṟai Eppeṟpaṭṭa I
ṟaiyum veṭṭiyum maṟṟum Epper
ṟpaṭṭatum Iṟuttu (mi)kāttuk ku
ṭuppomākavum ce
nnir veṭṭi ceyāka
tākavum Annir muṉ
ṉam pāccapeṟu
vatākavum cantirā
tittavaṟ niṟka Ip
paricoṭṭi viṟṟukkuṭu
ttom tiruppaḻuvūr Ū
rāy Icainta Ūrom
Ivūrāriṭai vilaiko
ṇṭu Ipparameśva
raṟku cantirātittava
ṟniṟkka nti
vaṇa
ceyvippatāka kalli
vacakki kuṭutteṉ cāt
taṉ Āccaṉeṉ .
Digital edition of SII 13.183 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
